meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fresh.
meanings.sent1: The freshness of the fruit made it irresistible to eat.
meanings.sent2: I love the freshness of the morning air.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret to a delicious salad is the freshness of the ingredients.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a freshness that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The freshness of the flowers in the garden was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The state of being new or recently made.
meanings.sent1: The freshness of the paint on the walls gave the room a vibrant look.
meanings.sent2: The freshness of the news excited everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The freshness of the cookies made them disappear in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The freshness of the ideas presented in the meeting sparked creativity.
meanings.sent5: The freshness of the snowfall covered the town in a blanket of white.

meanings.definition: The quality of being pleasantly clean or pure.
meanings.sent1: The freshness of the laundry detergent left a pleasant scent on the clothes.
meanings.sent2: The freshness of the water from the mountain stream was refreshing.
meanings.sent3: The freshness of the soap bubbles made bath time fun for the kids.
meanings.sent4: The freshness of the air after the rain washed away all the dust.
meanings.sent5: The freshness of the salad made it a healthy choice for lunch.
